name: Silver Wire
description:
"Silver Wire" is an action game where you can enjoy defeating enemies with wires.
The purpose of this game is to kill as many enemies as possible.

Player Actions:
- Bind and cut monsters.

Enemies:
- Zombie: Move towards the player. Some walk and some run.
- Bat: Move straight on the stage. It reflects when it hits a wall.

Rules:
- If you touch an enemy, you will be damaged.
- The first damage is prevented by the shield, but the second is game over.
- The shield will heal when you defeat 100 enemies.
